tagline: Tag As Object is a simple DOM Framework for php
body:
__ __|                \            _ \  |    _)           |
	   |  _` |  _` |     _ \    __|   |   | __ \  |  _ \  __| __|
	   | (   | (   |    ___ \ \__ \   |   | |   | |  __/ (    |
	  _|\__,_|\__, |  _/    _\____/  \___/ _.__/  |\___|\___|\__|
	          |___/                           ___/


			is a PHP5 wrapper for DOMImplementation


* Do not write HTML anymore
* Do not mix PHP code and output string anymore
* Manipulate HTML objects (as you do using jQuery, mootools, etc…)
* Render beautiful and indented code
* Access page elements by object referencing or using css3 selectors
* Import existing code as tao nodes


Check the [getting started page](https://github.com/loranger/tao/wiki/Getting-started) for more information on using TAO


REQUIREMENTS :

	✓	PHP5+
		✓	DOM Extension
		✓	SPL Extension
		✓	Gettext Extension (optional)


01110100 01100001 01101111
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Tao
